We are noticing a growing tend of discriminatory posts and comments, attacking blue-ribbon & CCP supporters such as LeBron James and HK Evil Police.

While your anger is justifiable, the use of anti-Black racist, homophobic, and sexist comments will turn many Western pro-HK democracy supporters against us.

Please be mindful of your language in these discussions and how fifty-cents can twist your words against us.

我們注意到，越來越多的歧視性帖子和評論，攻擊藍帶和中共支援者，如勒布朗詹姆斯和香港邪惡員警。 雖然你的憤怒是有道理的，但使用反黑人的種族主義、仇視同性戀和性別歧視的言論，將使許多支援香港的民主支援者反對我們。 請注意您在這些討論中的語言，以及五十美分如何扭曲你的話來對付我們。
